title: Funny Magic Invisible Ink Disappearing Pen with Blue Ink Ball Point Vanishing in 1-3 Hour (10)
features: This is the genuine disappearing "spy ink" pen,it looks just like a normal pen, but the writing will disappear automatically and gradually in about 1 hours

Make sure you dont press down too hard and leave dents in the paper! The ink will disappear, but creases won't which can give away any pranks. Ink started really disappearing after ten minutes, and after around two or three hours left barely a trace, so keep in mind that it does take a decent amount of time. If you really scribble with it the paper will be a bit rough where the ink was.
